name: ROMBO (14gameware)
description:
Warning: if the .exe doesen't work put it in the comments

ROMBO is a simple text-based game written in C#, it runs in the Windows console so that it hasn't a graphic interface.

Your spaceship has crashed in the planet ROMBO and you can't find your teammates, so that you start searching for them.

In this game you have to make decisions wisely because if you make a bad decision you have to start from the beginning.

Sorry for my english because it isn't my native language.  :)
